SQL.LOAD: SELECT product_code_id, region_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, product_region_id FROM elp_product_region WHERE product_region_id = :product_region_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT pr.Region_id, pr.product_code_id, pr.created_by, pr.created_date, pr.modified_by, pr.modified_date, pc.product_code Product_code, pc.description Product_description, pr.product_region_id FROM elp_product_Region pr, elp_product_code pc WHERE pr.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id AND pr.product_code_id = :product_code_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_product_region SET product_code_id = :product_code_id, region_id = :region_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE product_region_id = :product_region_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_product_region ( product_code_id, region_id, created_by, product_region_id ) VALUES ( :product_code_id, :region_id, :created_by, :product_region_id )
